text: Le meilleur spot the greasy spoon. La poutine est très bonne, ils mettent même de la sauce rendu à la moitié pour être sûrs qu'il y en a partout. Les burgers et le hot-dogs sont pas chers à l'unité, parfait pour un petit snack en passant! Le personnel est vraiment motivé.
Le meilleur fast-food sur la promenade Ontario ! J'aime l'ambiance d'une autre époque de ce restaurant d'Hochelaga ! La sauce à Poutine est unique !

Old school burgers and fries or as they say it in Montreal a casss croute. $7 will get you a mountain of fries and a cheeseburger topped with all the fixins. Not a big burger, probably 3 oz, but still has a ton of flavour. Bon appetite bon gars!

C'est bon, c'est gras, c'est vieux pis c'est pas cher.
Frites maison qui valent le déplacement.
Un des meilleurs spots à Poutine du quartier selon moi.
J'adore!

The poutine here is to die for! The fries are amazing. They taste almost home made, and fresh. The gravy is unique... Very different from your traditional poutine gravy. Its aromatic and adds a gourmet taste to the poutine. And lastly, the cheese curds are sooo good! 

The poutine prices are quite reasonable ($5-8). Their cheese burgers ($2.49) are also very delicious. Great greasy spoon food for a great value!

Great diner for that occasional grease-fest we all crave from time to time.

The food is exactly what you would except, the nice soggy twice-fried french fries, the steamy hot dogs, and their tasty burgers.

The staff is extremely friendly, the patrons are all regulars from the area drinking coffees and sharing stories, the decor has not been touched in probably 30-40 years (Which I personally love).

Pros: Good food, good price, great ambiance, good staff, nice retro decor, and a huge terrace.

Cons: Single toilets are cramped and dirty

All-in-all a real gem in the Hochelaga area.

Awesome greasy spoon that do great Montreal style steamés, poutines and burgers.

Cash only, but for unhealthy, cheap and tasty, it's the best in the neighbourhood.
Honnêtement ces bon (pas excellent non plus) mais cher tout de même pour ce qu'ont avait sur le plateau. Je recommanderais pas personnellement.
